author: Football Italia staff
title: Coronavirus: Guardiola's mother dies
description: The mother of Manchester City coach Pep Guardiola has tragically passed away after contracting coronavirus.  	Dolors Sala Carrio, a native and resident of Barcelona, was aged 82.
content:
The mother of Manchester City coach Pep Guardiola has tragically passed away after contracting coronavirus.
Dolors Sala Carrio, a native and resident of Barcelona, was aged 82.
